item.title: Report E-2025050260
item.description:
Report E-2025050260

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-19
  • City: Minden
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Enroute routine inspection revealed a leak of thick blue and purple washing liquid impacting trailer, tires and slow dripping onto ground. Driver immediately notified manager, internal spill team was dispatched and cleaned the spill. 1 drum gasket failed or was missing. Drum was secured unopened. Duration was a few hours of slow dripping thick liquid, totaling 1 gallon est.
